content: captains log: this is Arman reporting in
new idea: AI enabled investing sandbox
new idea: fifa world cup 2026 schedule/planner
new idea: 3d printed stylized pomodoro type timer with themed sounds for monique
new idea: find open-source projects to contribute to
new idea: continue improving project echo

idea about ai coding

if we are basically able to 1 shot whole apps, why should we even try to fix anything afterwards. just 1 shot it, if it doesn't do something correctly, add more to the inital request/PRD documentation then have it regenerate from scratch. This only works for brand new apps mainly i guess, but the idea of fixing generated code in a thread with the bot instead of just restarting maybe is the wrong one.
project echo logs should somehow keep track of teeth brushing, showering, smoking? any other activity we wish to track? how can we do this realistically?

new idea: matchday history experience app, which media from before and after the games, then playing highlights of the match and then reactions from afterwards. really putting you in the context of the match when you revisit it.

idea about ai coding

if we stick with 1 shot, it also makes it much easier to compare models/workflows/prompt etc
